name: bdo
summary: The `<bdo>` HTML element overrides the current directionality of text, so that the text within is rendered in a different direction.
contentCategories: Flow content, phrasing content, palpable content.
permittedParents: Any element that accepts phrasing content.

dir.name: dir
dir.summary: The direction in which text should be rendered in this element's contents. Possible values are.
